summary: Defines a collection of element classes that encapsulate various content types—such as custom components, dataframes, PDFs, Plotly/Matplotlib visualizations, tasks, task lists, and plain text—for transmission from the backend to the user interface.
business_intent: Provide a unified, serializable abstraction layer that enables developers to package, send, and manage diverse UI payloads, facilitating seamless communication between server‑side logic and front‑end rendering components.
